Previous: bhaṭNext: bhan

√bhaṇ 'speak'

present: [1.] bhaṇati etc.  

perfect: babhāṇa  babhaṇitha  

aorist: [1.] abhāṇi   -- [3.] abībhaṇat  ababhāṇat   -- [5.] abhāṇīt  

[future: bhaṇiṣyati  bhaṇitā  ]

verbal: bhaṇita  bhaṇitvā  

secondary: passive: bhaṇyate   -- desiderative: bibhaṇiṣa-   -- causative: bhāṇayati  

derivatives: -bhaṇa  bhaṇana C.  bhaṇanīya C.  bhaṇiti C.  bhāṇa C.  bhāṇaka C.  bibhaṇiṣu C.  

A later form of √bhan.
